Candlelight: Using candles strategically placed around the room can create a warm and cozy atmosphere. You can use different types of candles such as tapered, pillar, or mason jars to add visual interest.
Solar-powered lights: Solar-powered lights can be installed on the windows or walls to provide natural light during the day and a soft glow at night.
LED grow lights: LED grow lights can be used to create a soft, ambient light in the room. They can be hung on the walls or ceiling and can be programmed to turn on and off at specific times.

Fireplace or stove: If you have a fireplace or stove, you can use it to create a warm and inviting atmosphere in the room. You can also use a portable fire pit or a camping stove to create a fire outside.

Glow-in-the-dark furniture or decor: Glow-in-the-dark furniture or decor can add a fun and playful element to the room. You can use glow-in-the-dark paint, stickers, or furniture to create a unique and interesting lighting effect.
